content: What legendary baseball player, also known as the Sultan of Swat, set numerous records during his career including most home runs in a season?

The legendary baseball player you're referring to is Babe Ruth, often called the "Sultan of Swat." He holds many records, including the most home runs in a single season, which he set in 1927 with 60 home runs. His impact on the game was immense, and he's widely regarded as one of the greatest baseball players of all time.
